name: 911 Rescue Simulator
description:
An accident has been reported on the highway and you must respond. Get in your police car and drive fast to the accident. Once there, you access the scene and decide what to do. Do you send the Ambulance? Maybe the Firetruck? Or maybe, you can handle this yourself. Choose correctly, and your will advance to the next level. Choose wrong and you will find yourself back behind a desk doing paperwork.

Features:
--Race to the scene of an accident in your police car
--Decide on the best action to take
--Drive an Ambulance, Firetruck, School Bus or Backup Police car to the scene
--Awesome 3D graphics and exciting gameplay
--12 Missions to Complete
--Radio Chatter
--Realistic accident scenarios

This game contains 2 different regions. The Mountain region with Snow, and the Desert region with Rain.

Enjoy!
